case_data.name: Branch v. City of Bellwood
case_data.plaintiff_description: Female plaintiff arrested by Town of Bellwood officers and then subjected to strip search.
case_data.summary:
On February 6, 1996, a woman who had been strip searched by police officers filed this case against the City of Bellwood, Illinois in the United States District Court for the Northern District of Illinois. Plaintiff, represented by the People's Law Offices, sought damages.

The parties reached a settlement on October 23, 1996, with the defendant to pay damages but since the only document we have is the docket, the terms of the settlement are unknown.
